FROM python:3.6

WORKDIR /fate

COPY . /fate

RUN rm /bin/sh && ln -sf /bin/bash /bin/sh

RUN tar -xf fate.tar && rm fate.tar

RUN rm fate.tar

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends libgmp3-dev -y && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y libmpfr-dev libmpfr-doc libmpfr4 libmpfr4-dbg && apt-get install --no-install-recommends libmpc-dev -y && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

ENV PYTHONPATH /fate
